title: Equality. Part 2
creator_credit: Art Ciocco, Paul Buck, Ken Stein, New Jersey Public Television and Best Films
brief_description: Explores the diversity of people and the breadth of the problems as one searches for “equality”. Concentrates on the basic areas of economics, ethnic groups, problems of old age and alternate lifestyle. Contains some b&w sequences.
creator_credit_for_label: Art Ciocco, Paul Buck, Ken Stein, New Jersey Public Television and Best Films
